about_the_game:
After a sudden invasion of space aliens hunting for human biological waste, the job of a sewage truck operator has become a perilous craft. Join the elite of the elite and become a transporter of the brown gold — the very substance without which the world wouldn’t be quite so... picturesque. But beware: dark alleys hide sinister surprises, and no matter how hard you try, you’ll never be fully prepared for what lurks there. It’s not just aliens after you — sludge demons spawned from the filth and the fanatical followers of the Brown Cult, whose ominous leader is rumored to have ties to a shadowy global government, are on your tail too.

  • Drive and upgrade your ZIL truck.

  • Survive in the stench-filled atmosphere of terror.

  • Complete tasks for the district administrator and the sewage treatment plant director.

  • Explore every corner of the open world, no matter how foul it smells.

  • Help locals dispose of hazardous waste and reduce environmental pollution.

  • Uncover the mystery of the aliens and expose the conspiracy of the secret global government.

💩 Welcome to the ride of your life — and what a smelly one it will be!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains semi-realistic depictions of violence, scenes of smoking and alcohol consumption. It also alludes to some bodily functions (no explicit imagery) and resulting substances that may be unpleasant to some.

It’s not just aliens after you — sludge demons spawned from the filth and the fanatical followers of the Brown Cult, whose ominous leader is rumored to have ties to a shadowy global government, are on your tail too.

name: Fecal Freighter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / RX 560 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super 6GB / AMD RX 5500 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Become a sewage truck operator and survive the foul dangers: drive your ZIL, battle sludge demons, complete tasks, explore a grim world, and uncover the mystery of an alien conspiracy.
